title: Skillet Chicken with Lemon Garlic Cream Sauce
directions: Pound down chicken breast with a mallet. Season with salt and pepper.
Combine chicken broth, lemon juice, garlic, and red pepper flakes in a bowl.
Position the rack to the lower part of the oven and preheat to 375
Heat olive oil in an oven-safe skillet on medium-high heat.
Brown chicken on both sides then remove to a plate.
Reduce the heat and add shallots and broth mixture. Use a whisk to scrape the bottom of the pan.
Let the sauce reduce for about 8 minutes or until 1/3 cup remains and thickens.
Hold skillet off the heat source and add/whisk in butter and heavy cream. Stick back on for 30 seconds making sure sauce doesn't boil.
Turn off heat and add the chicken back to the pan.
Place the skillet on the oven for 5-8 minutes or until chicken is cooked through.
Season with chopped parsley or basil and additional lemon slices, if wanted.
ingredients: 1/3 cup finely diced shallots (or red onions)
